doc:
Roger Converse https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Converse 0 Roger Converse (June 26, 1911 – September 21, 1994) was an American motion picture actor and MGM contract player of the late 1930s, who made a name for himself portraying gentlemen, boyfriends, and blue collar guys. Roger_Converse ( June_26_,_1911 – September_21_,_1994 ) was an_American_motion_picture_actor and MGM_contract_player of the_late_1930s , who made a_name for himself portraying_gentlemen , boyfriends , and blue_collar_guys .
